As most FPS games. Toxicity are there... if you can't take it do uninstall your game :-P

This game is a classic case of a good fps, hindered by it's ability to control the hackers. You have to put so many hours into this game in order to understand the mechanics, and being in silver is basically asking to be playing with/against hackers. Your best choice is to play Faceit or ESEA, even then you shouldn't play it unless you're actually decent. This game is not noobie friendly anymore. But it's hell of a good game to play.

This game can make you question your sanity at times too however.
